website_summaries.verdict: While it’s unfortunate that this lens requires a specific case, if you’re in the market for a panoramic lens with a broad field of view for vlogging, nature photography, or sporting events, it’s definitely worth a look.
pros: Ultra-wide 170 degree fisheye-like lens for capturing more in each photo without the “bubble” effect that fisheye lenses are known for
cons: You need to purchase a Moment M-series Photo Case or M-series Battery Photo Case to use this lens

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressed with the glass
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised at how much I love this lens. Highly recommend. While attachment is easy, you really do wanna be careful how you do it. It takes a few tries to get it right. My one issue now is that I need to figure out how to carry all three lenses without worrying about dust or damage, especially since they don't have rear lens caps.
customer_reviews.author: JenZat

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Say Enough Good Things!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is “Wow.” I ended up with this lens as there was a wait list for their newest lens. Thought I would like it as much but I was wrong. This lens is amazing for sightseeing and urban scenery.
customer_reviews.author: JaimetheJourneyer

customer_reviews.title: Moment lenses MUST Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Moment super wide angle lenses (170 degrees field of view) is high quality lenses and sturdy. Well built. High quality optics and value when compared with competitors. In addition, Moments offers upgrade cases as the new Smartphones are released so you upgrade easily. Picture quality is good for the price compared to $1k for fish eye on SLR. Compact enough to travel on vacation. A must buy if you are photographer on a budget and don’t have opportunity to carry a SLR all of the time. Plan to take it on next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Bass Man

customer_reviews.title: Superfish Indeed
customer_reviews.text: If you LOVE the fisheye, super wide angle look, then the lens does not disappoint. I've tried other mobile lenses before and Moment's lens is the most sturdy, well built mobile lens solution I've tried. Photo quality is great, way less lens aberration on the edges and feels way more durable. Quality glass makes the difference. The weight of the lens takes some getting used to, but its worth the adjustment for the quality of images.
customer_reviews.author: santosa

customer_reviews.title: Great lens for phones!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd moment lens. I also have the wide angle and Tele lens. Moment makes the most well built lenses for phones I've ever seen. The metal is sturdy and the glass is excellent quality! There is some distortion but that's expected from a fisheye. It's great for capturing a lot in the frame without having to back up or zoom out. In the attached picture of the Millennium Falcon at Disneyland, I was right up on it and still was able to capture the entire thing. Highly recommend this lens
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lens and gives high quality fisheye look with limited distortion and excellent clarity
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lens - love the fish eye and use it all the time. Absolutely love how i am able to get super wide angle shots. Gives a totally different perspective vs standard iphone shots. I have used the clip ons and a few other lenses but this is wayyyyyy better. I'm definitely going to get the other lenses as well to add to the collection The cap is great for protecting the lens and the microfiber pouch is great for cleaning the lens on the go
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Vignette on iPhone 11
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than the 18mm and 58mm. I did know the 15mm was build for previous generation iPhone that the vignetting on iPhone 11 is pretty strong. Going to get the 14mm instead. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sacul

customer_reviews.title: Makes new kinds of iphone pictures possible.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lens. It works great with my iPhone Xs Max on the 1x camera. The Superfish perspective creates great photo opportunities where none exists otherwise. Note, the lens also works with the phone's 2x camera, but only if you use the Moment camera app. That app gives you the ability to select the 1x or 2x lens only, a level of control that the iPhone's native camera app does not provide.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDarden

customer_reviews.title: Simply a great lens, if you like the effect.
customer_reviews.text: Great construction and optical quality. The fisheye creates an effect, of course, but it is a nice effect, very well done. Took it on my recent trip to Colorado and Utah, and got some wonderful shots off the Royal Gorge bridge, as you can probably well imagine. Highly recommended, as well as the NEW wide-angle lens. Moment rules!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Minot

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love my Moment gear! The fisheye lens comes packaged with care and style with a thick cover that slides on easily and I believe would protect my lens if it fell--it's a thick rubbery material. I've been using it to get photos of some of the smaller rooms i'm remodeling where I'd otherwise be getting pictures of individual corners of the room only.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Pollack

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: *Update* The lens great the case is faulty. You can’t use the lens without the case. I would not recommend it. It is not worth it. when I tried to remove the case for the first time it was stretched out as if it wasn’t meant to be taken off and put back on. The case was bent and became useless. This happens a year ago and I want to make sure I updated this review. I’ve paid for expensive lenses that I cannot use. Maxing lenses worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: aqwati15

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece as a birthday present and she is loving it. She attaches it to her Iphone for better quality pictures. She separately bought a case for her phone that allows this to attach to. he fisheye pictures show a wider field of view and very clear images.
customer_reviews.author: The COM

customer_reviews.title: I'M NOT A PROFFESIONAL, BUT I FELT LIKE ONE.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Made every picture I took look as 3x as cooler. It's a Fish eye view and you can angle and play around with it to take really creative and awesome photos. Locks in super securely (I had to climb a mountain). Don't drop this thing however, it is fragile, but so is every lens. The value however might be a little expensive, but the brand is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good Lens. Feels really sturdy and it’s made of quality material. Attaches nicely to the moment case which just makes it all around great for taking pictures. Oh and the pictures I have been able to take are awesome. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Earned my business
customer_reviews.text: Great image quality, simple and quick attachment, fair price, and a business that takes the time to keep the customer informed after the money has exchanged hands. I will be buying more of your products as they come available.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fisheye lense cover is defective
customer_reviews.text: I love the fish eye lense the only prob the cover that it came with the lense doesn’t even stick on the lense . Everytime I put it on I keep dropping it and basically lost it the first day I used it. Now I have to spend another $10 to but just the cover of the lense
customer_reviews.author: The angry customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Had their Wide Lens for about a year now. Been loving the results I've had with the photos/videos I've been shooting. Figured the superfish would be the next lens to get. I'm traveling next month so it seemed fitting to purchase one to do some vlogging/landscape photography. The photo samples from other buyers here and on the shopmoment site helped cement my purchase. Had it now for about 2 weeks and don't know if I ever want to use my wide lens again lol. Thanks for making another great product Moment!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Believe I’ll be gettin’ the rest of the lenses
customer_reviews.text: I hated spending $150 on the lens and case... until I got it. I love it. Best fisheye for a phone period. I’m saying this and I haven’t left the house with it yet. If you’re really into getting the most out of your camera on your phone, get the Moment setup.
customer_reviews.author: Tazz Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Extreme wide angle clarity at a cost
customer_reviews.text: An excellent cell phone lens that adds quite a bit of capabilities to your phone camera. This is an extreme wide angle that will get things into the frame that you couldn't imagine but without distortion at the edges like those cheaper clip on lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Buddha

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This lens is awesome, you can carry it easily and just mount it on your phone whenever you want to take pictures. Super fish lens is made for landscape pictures though, that’s perfect for our Christmas walks and for our future travels. I recommend Moment lenses, the price is quite high (+ import fees and shipping costs) but the quality is there and you won’t regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good quality fisheye lens
customer_reviews.text: This lens works great and is adaptable to most smartphones. You can also find Lens Clip Adapters for the selfie camera. This will give your images a cool look. Try it really close to a subject or to capture a wide panorama.
customer_reviews.author: D. Laster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing photos with this lens.
customer_reviews.text: These lenses take amazing pictures. And they are very sturdy but also very heavy. they come with a nice carrying case and cleaning rag but I would recommend getting a harder case to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Thedizz

customer_reviews.title: This is the fisheye lens I e been looking for. BUY NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this lens, works perfect with the moment case, it is very sturdy and solid, image quality is remarkable, really good glass, a blast to use it close up on subjects, comes with cleaning pouch and lens cap. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle J

customer_reviews.title: just see the pictures
customer_reviews.text: if you have a good smartphone camera, this takes it to the next level... it's like taking a go pro wide angle anywhere, and being able to edit and post right away. Great built quality, Great Resolution
customer_reviews.author: Reivajss

customer_reviews.title: exactly what you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging and the lens was a wider angle then the new iphone wide lens so it was worth it especially if you dont have the wide angle on the iphone
customer_reviews.author: greg onofri

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a true fish-eye
customer_reviews.text: I kept this instead of returning, but I've only used once or twice... Definitely not what I would consider a fish-eye.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fish eye lens for casual photography.
customer_reviews.text: Moment make some of the best quality lenses for cell phone as far as my opinion. Well worth the money. My favorite is the macro lens.
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Like another Pixel 2 XL user, I have vignetting in my images (it could be device specific). The curvature is also too much for me, I like the wide-angle lens I got at the same time better. Feels very study and quality, just not what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, thing little guy is AWESOME! Specially for the iPhone X. I’ve bought cheaper clip on ones and this thing is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Perez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve attached a photo that I took during Christmas. I would definitely recommend this lense specially if you want to take a photo nos capture the surroundings. I was standing on the sidewalk of the house and I managed to get the entire house and the sorroundings. The lense captured the bright lights even though it was dark outside. Out of all the lenses this one is by far my favorite one because you have the ability to capture more and the quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are quite impressive for such a small size. I bought them for my wife and she is absolutely loving the results.
customer_reviews.author: cramblda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to use & creates fun & cool shots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Moment iPhone lenses! They are easy to fasten to the case & give a crisp, clear photo. The super fish lens gave my photos a fun & artistic look. The quality is top of the line. The lens came with a cap & cloth bag for storage. You definitely your money’s worth with the iPhone lens.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Downing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for unexpected shots
customer_reviews.text: I ended up using this lens for everything from pictures of my home, rooms, garage, beach shots and more. The usual top-notch quality of Moment Lenses with no visible distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Highintensity

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with the build quality and the image quality. I had expectations when I order the lens and it surpassed it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: Capture Everything
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Build quality is second to none. Field of view is incredible. I do notice the I am getting cut off on the left edges.. is this normal
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: This lens works great on the iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Just what I wanted. It's fantastic! Great for the avid photographer who wants the freedom of the cellphone and the some additional lenses. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Treder

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Moment
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many fisheye lenses for the iPhone for filming skateboarding but the Moment is by far the best one I have used! It’s super wide and very crispy! I use it with Filmic Pro and the Deathlens app with great results!
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. So in love. This has been a blast to use. It is legit. If it weren’t as little as it is I would think it’s a dslr lens! It has great weight to it & is very clear and simple to use. Beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t need this on your phone
customer_reviews.text: Will just give bad quality pictures to your phone use your camera phone itself

customer_reviews.title: It was great experience
customer_reviews.text: It was high quality but the package delivered opened not sealed and there are dust on lens but still I am satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat Moment Lenses
customer_reviews.text: Moment makes high quality lenses for iPhones - I was happy to get this new one for my iPhone X. Works perfectly with their case which you can buy separately. Also comes with a lens cap and small pouch for storing safely when you're not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Expands creativity with photos
customer_reviews.text: I like taking pictures of nature with my phone and this adds a lot to pictures in many different settings and takes away the guesswork experienced with clip one. The clarity from corner to corner is also really good.
customer_reviews.author: ogarza

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lens A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Best Lens Ever! I use it all times and i have the Wide Angle and takes amazin pictures with my iphone xs max
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great moment lens
customer_reviews.text: Great lens for those wide angle shots can give you a fisheye look depending on how you use it. Great product from moment.

customer_reviews.title: They need to find another way to attach to your phone.
customer_reviews.text: The case is very bulky. Would prefer another way to attach this lens to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: NRG_005

customer_reviews.title: First of I'm using it on a pixel XL. ...
customer_reviews.text: First of I'm using it on a pixel XL. The lens seems sharp, but it is not rectilinear. At least not with this phone. Not sure if it is with an iPhone, or which model of iPhone would make this a rectilinear lens.
customer_reviews.author: Norberto Cuenca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and built with quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, the lens is made with quality materials. The pictures taken were amazing using the default camera app and even more options when you use the Moment app. I really enjoy taking pictures with my new lens. I saw that Moment has 3 more lenses available ( Macro, Telephoto and Wide Lens), i will be buying all of them in the near future. Another amazing lens in the works is the Anamorphic lens that is being sold on Kickstarter, i will definitely buy it once it is out on their website. Thanks again for making excellent products, this is what we need, Innovation !!!. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fun!
customer_reviews.text: I own the Moment telephoto and wide angle lenses, but the fish eye is my favorite! Really impressive results.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without this lens. It’s a ton of fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little lens. It’s Tac sharp, and allows a ton of creativity. Especially cool inside buildings.

customer_reviews.text: Using the lens for video mostly. This first test video is shot on iPhone XS Max, Moment Superfish and DJI Osmo Mobile.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a case too. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Very very very veryyyyyy impressed!!!!! My friends thought I used a GoPro but nope! I am very satisfied. Don’t forget to buy a case to hold the camera!

customer_reviews.title: Did not serve my purpose for advertising realestate.  Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the telephoto lens, the images from this lens are in focus. There is significant distoration, however. The fish-eye lens seems to have too much fish-eye bending of the image. I was planning to use this lens for real-estate photos (i.e., capture the image of a kitchen) but it will not work. That said, i LOVE the MOMENT NEW WIDE ANGLE LENS. I returned this fish eye lens, and I am only keeping the wide angle lens. I am still waiting for the refund.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Going to buy more lenses
customer_reviews.text: works very well with the Moment case. I love it. Going to buy more lenses...

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lenses!
customer_reviews.text: Love Moment lenses! The build quality is amazing and they work great. I have the wide angle and the fish eye and love both. There really isn’t anything I would change.

customer_reviews.text: The quality of this lens is second to none. Little to no vignetting on the corners of my pictures when using this. This brings my vlogging game up to a large degree!

customer_reviews.title: Take time to learn to use the lens and adjust to using it. Awesome and fun lens.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality lens I've had!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected! Quality is great, heavy and pictures are stable and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Dark corners when used with Pixel 2
customer_reviews.text: I was quite excited about the lens (it really looks and feels like a quality product) until I saw dark corners in my photos (top & bottom left corners in portrait orientation – see attached pic). I contacted Moment and they were nice enough to send me a replacement although unfortunately it produced similar results. An engineer at Moment explained to me that the optical image stabilization on the phone moves the camera module around which makes it difficult to achieve the perfect alignment. I'm keeping the lens as I still like it overall (I'll just have to zoom in a little), but it's something to consider if you are planning to use it with a Pixel 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lenses are sturdy, strong
customer_reviews.text: These lenses are sturdy, strong, and the glass is amazing. I would highly recommend picking up any and all of Moments lenses. I purchased all four of their new lenses, and am more than pleased with their quality.

customer_reviews.title: its like totally awesome

customer_reviews.text: Works great with my new iPhone 8 Plus! I don't carry my camera as often anymore now that I have lenses and case from Moment!

customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Recommend 100% I went from my old Canon 7d to my new Pixel XL 2 and this lens. The final shots are very good, not mention the the difference in size and weight to carry around my 7d. Great product.

product_meta.title: Moment - 15mm Fisheye Lens for iPhone, Pixel, Samsung Galaxy and OnePlus Camera Phones
feature_bullets: The Moment 15mm Fisheye Lens works with older iPhone, Pixel, Galaxy and OnePlus Phones 2018 and older. This product includes a lens, lens cap, and microfiber bag. To maximize the edge to edge clarity we recommend the Fisheye 15mm lens for camera phones created 2018 and prior, and our new Fisheye 14mm for anything newer.
This product REQUIRES you to purchase a Moment Case OR Battery Photo Case to attach the lens to your phone. Mounts over either lens on dual lens phones enabling nearly limitless creativity.

This is our classic Fisheye 15mm lens, previous called our Superfish lens. This lens is super wide, with a 170 degree field of view, producing a 56% wider image than the 75 degrees (iPhone X) you will find on a standard phone camera.
Moment makes the highest quality attachment lenses on the market. Made with aerospace grade metal and the same hand-polished glass used for high-end 4K film lenses.
We backup our products with a lifetime warranty, great customer service and a 100% satisfaction guarantee with free shipping and returns. Ask us how to get set up with a Moment gear guide.
